data.name: Status_Connected
data.comment: Device connection status when successfully connected

data.name: Status_Disconnected
data.comment: Device connection status when not connected

data.name: Status_Discovering
data.comment: Device connection status during discovery process

data.name: Status_Error
data.comment: Device connection status when an error occurred

data.name: USB_DeviceInserted
data.comment: Message shown when a USB device is detected

data.name: USB_DeviceRemoved
data.comment: Message shown when a USB device is disconnected

data.name: Error_ConnectionFailed
data.comment: Generic connection failure message

data.name: Error_DeviceNotFound
data.comment: Error when device cannot be found during discovery

data.name: Error_InvalidAddress
data.comment: Error when the entered address is invalid

data.name: Device_SerialNumberPrefix
data.comment: Prefix for device serial number display

data.name: Connection_DeviceConnectedFormat
data.value: Device connected at address {0} running at a baud rate of {1}
data.comment: Format string for displaying connection details. {0} = address, {1} = baud rate

data.name: Connect_Connect
data.comment: Button text to connect to device

data.comment: Message when device is not identified
